QuestData.Title: The Corruption of the Jadefire
QuestData.Description: The cleansing of this forest has been a grueling process. For every success we have achieved, a new challenge has arisen.$B$BThe Jadefire satyr have been a constant nuisance. They seek to corrupt the forest just as we seek to cleanse it. Now, we have taken steps to begin eradicating them from Felwood entirely.$B$BTravel to Jadefire Glen to the west and rid the forest of their presence. You'll find the entrance just north of the walls of Deadwood Village; look for their vile banners.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 12 Jadefire Satyr or Jadefire Felsworn in Jadefire Glen.
QuestData.CompletionText: Jadefire Glen is our first target in a series of coordinated efforts. The others will be dealt with in time.
QuestData.RewardText: The Emerald Circle thanks you, $n. If we all work together here, we can purge these demons from our midst.
